description: The original PlayStation was released in America in 1995. It was the first computer entertainment platform to ship 100 million units. PlayStation has continued to stay one of the most popular gaming systems out there. This black woven button-up shirt features an all-over gaming controller icon print design. Made from 100% Cotton.
about: This Short Sleeve collared shirt is Great for Gaming Fans, Old School and New
Machine Wash Cold, Tumble Dry Low
